title: DashboardChartAdded
description: Recorded when a Data Analyst adds a chart to a dashboard with position and size.

chartId.description: Unique identifier for this chart placement

chartDefinitionId.description: Reference to the ChartDefinition from Analytics

tabId.description: Optional tab ID if chart is placed within a tab

chartConfig.description: Optional chart-specific configuration as JSON blob

addedAt.description: Timestamp when the chart was added
